definition: Mohammed (c. 570-632), central figure of Islam and prophet of God
solemn/reverent/calm/burial position in an ancestral tomb (old)/old variant of 默
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
Mullah Mohammad Omar (1959-), Taliban leader, Afghan head of state 1996-2001
pinyin: Mu4 han3 mo4 de2 · Ou1 ma3
Mu4 han3 mo4 de2 liu4 shi4

sentences.english: Near Mohammed Sultan, Clarke Quay, Great World City, Orchard Road, Killinery.
sentences.chinese: 穆罕默德苏丹，克拉码头，跻身世界大都会，乌节路。

sentences.english: Early in his disease, Muhammad shied away from the spotlight.
sentences.chinese: 在患病初期，穆罕默德远离了媒体的聚光灯。

sentences.english: The shrine is believed by many to be the tomb of the Prophet Muhammad's son-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 很多人都相信这座清真寺是先知穆罕默德女婿的陵墓。

sentences.english: When the Prophet wed Aisha she was only 9.
sentences.chinese: 阿以莎嫁给穆罕默德的时候才九岁。

sentences.english: Ms. Mohammed asked. “Why is that the government's fault?
sentences.chinese: 穆罕默德女士问到，“为何这要算到政府的头上？”

sentences.english: Near Mohammed Sultan, Clarke Quay, Great World City, Orchard Road, Killiney.
sentences.chinese: 穆罕默德苏丹，克拉码头，跻身世界大都会，乌节路。

sentences.english: Azhar is a leader of the Jaish-e-Mohammad extremist movement.
sentences.chinese: 艾兹哈尔是穆罕默德军极端主义运动的领导人。

sentences.english: It was memorized by Muhammad , who then dictated it to his Companions.
sentences.chinese: 它由穆罕默德记诵，再对他的追随者口述。

sentences.english: King Mohammed will also visit Shanghai and Hong Kong besides Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 除北京外，穆罕默德国王还将访问上海和香港。

sentences.english: I also bear witness that Muhammad is the faithful Servant and Messenger of Allah.
sentences.chinese: 我又作证穆罕默德是衪的忠仆，也是衪的差使。

sentences.english: Then he asked me who was the prophet of God, and I answered him Mohammed.
sentences.chinese: 随后，他问我谁是上帝的先知，我答说是穆罕默德。

sentences.english: As the story goes, the name of Islamic Great Prophet is Mohammed.
sentences.chinese: 据说，伊斯兰教的圣使名曰穆罕默德。

sentences.english: Muhammad's seal was an engraved Cornelian set in a silver ring.
sentences.chinese: 穆罕默德的玉玺就是一枚银环镶边的阴雕红玉髓。

sentences.english: Mehemet Ali's mosque smells of blood.
sentences.chinese: 穆罕默德阿里清真寺充满血腥味。

sentences.english: I Don't like the Mahomet , I negative the Muslim!
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢穆罕默德，我反对穆斯林。

sentences.english: Prophet Muhammad named her "Asma of the Two Belts."
sentences.chinese: 先知穆罕默德称她为“两条腰带的阿斯玛”。

definition: Mohammed (c. 570-632), central figure of Islam and prophet of God/also written 穆罕默德
Husain or Hussein (name)/Hussein (c. 626-680), Muslim leader whose martyrdom is commemorated at Ashura/Saddam Hussein al Tikriti (1937-2006), dictator of Iraq 1979-2003
Suleiman (name)/General Michel Suleiman (1948-), Lebanese military man and politician, president of Lebanon 2008-2014
(loanword) caliph/also written 哈利發|哈利发[ha1 li4 fa1]
Bashir (name)/Omar Hassan Ahmad al-Bashir (1944-), Sudanese military man and politician, president of Sudan from 1993
Sudan/sultan (ruler of some Muslim states, esp. Ottoman Emperor)
Anwar (name)/Anwar bin Ibrahim (1947-), Malaysian politician, deputy prime minister 1993-1998, imprisoned 1999-2004 on charges including alleged homosexual acts, subsequently overturned
Mohammed Abdel Rahman Abdel Raouf Arafat al-Qudwa al-Husseini (1929-2004), Palestinian leader, popularly known as Yasser Arafat 亞西爾·阿拉法特|亚西尔·阿拉法特[Ya4 xi1 er3 · A1 la1 fa3 te4]
